name: JumpFun
description:
Use the keys to move, Space bar to Jump!

S to go to checkpoint

R to reset the level

My 7th game of 2020! There is a lot of secrets to search, a timed run mode, a secret UI and a level on the sky!

Jump slide and wall jump while you explore this fast paced sliding game!

I would love to continue improving the game, but unity doesn´t take kindly games from old versions, so i can´t keep working on it :,(

Hope you enjoy it!
